p: The role and collaboration of International Organizations related to Health such as WHO, Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO), International Union of Nutritional Science (IUNS), and Non-Governmental Organizations (NGOs) as well as international consortia such as Universal Scientific Education and Research Network (USERN) and national and international academies, have been recognized as crucial for an integrated knowledge of the novel coronavirus and impacting the effective management of COVID-19 around the planet.
